name: sofistik-tools
description: A superset of commands to improve SOFiSTiK workflow

envPath.title: SOFiSTiK installation path
envPath.description: Path to the SOFiSTiK installation folder.

version.title: SOFiSTiK program version
version.description: Select the software version for which the programs will be used. Ensure that the software and licence are available on your computer.

showKeystrokes.title: Enable keystroke hints
showKeystrokes.description: Show info message with keystroke in lists
